devdoc.details: Manually encodes and decodes the MarketParameter struct into storage.      (external-safe): this library is safe to externalize    struct StoredMarketParameter {        /* slot 0 */        uint24 fundingFee;          // <= 1677%        uint24 interestFee;         // <= 1677%        uint24 makerFee;            // <= 1677%        uint24 takerFee;            // <= 1677%        uint24 riskFee;             // <= 1677%        uint16 maxPendingGlobal;    // <= 65k        uint16 maxPendingLocal;     // <= 65k        uint24 maxPriceDeviation;   // <= 1677%        uint24 __unallocated__;        uint8 flags;    }
